mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SELLSKU, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, CORPID, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CREATETIME, STATUS, CATEGORYID, SELLOPER, PURCHASEOPER, NUMFORSKU, NUMFORONLINEITEM, SODEFORONLINEITEM, NUMFORONLINESHOP, NUMFORSHOP, NUMFORDESCR, ONEWEEKNUM, TWOWEEKNUM, THREEWEEKNUM, FOURWEEKNUM, US, AU, UK, CA, DE, DESCRFLAG, PHOTOFLAG, STATUS1, ATTRIBUTE, ONESTAGE, TWOSTAGE, AVGNUM, ONEMONTH, NEWSALL, NEWS, TASKNUM, SEASONFLAG, RESERVE12, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11, EXPRESSTYPE1, EXPRESSTYPE2, EXPRESSTYPE3, EXPRESSTYPE4, EXPRESSTYPE5, MAOLI, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, GROSSPROFIT, RATEOFMARGIN, USITEMID, UKITEMID, AUITEMID, CAITEMID, DEITEMID, PICTUREID, NAME, ENNAME, TITLE, RESERVE1, RESERVE3, CATEGORYNAME, PICTURESTR from db_productforsell where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SELLSKU, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, CORPID, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CREATETIME, STATUS, CATEGORYID, SELLOPER, PURCHASEOPER, NUMFORSKU, NUMFORONLINEITEM, SODEFORONLINEITEM, NUMFORONLINESHOP, NUMFORSHOP, NUMFORDESCR, ONEWEEKNUM, TWOWEEKNUM, THREEWEEKNUM, FOURWEEKNUM, US, AU, UK, CA, DE, DESCRFLAG, PHOTOFLAG, STATUS1, ATTRIBUTE, ONESTAGE, TWOSTAGE, AVGNUM, ONEMONTH, NEWSALL, NEWS, TASKNUM, SEASONFLAG, RESERVE12, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11, EXPRESSTYPE1, EXPRESSTYPE2, EXPRESSTYPE3, EXPRESSTYPE4, EXPRESSTYPE5, MAOLI, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, GROSSPROFIT, RATEOFMARGIN, USITEMID, UKITEMID, AUITEMID, CAITEMID, DEITEMID, PICTUREID, NAME, ENNAME, TITLE, RESERVE1, RESERVE3, CATEGORYNAME, PICTURESTR from db_productforsell
